TopicTitle: Can anyone help me find a part?

Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm looking for a part that acts as a Decoupler or Nose Cone.

If anyone has come across the Part that resembles the one circled in red in either 2.5m or 1.25m please let me know.

Thanks, Sam

I'm not familiar with one in that size, but I know for sure that this mod has a 1.875m nose cone in that shape. Maybe you could tweakscale it.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67164-HGR-1-875m-parts-R-D-Thread-Mod-reboot-in-progress-%28First-Dev-build-now-available%29
Thanks Man! Never used 1.875m Parts before but they look like a perfect balance between 2.5m and 1.25m for making realistic launch vehicles.
Novapunch, It is a mod that has these type of nosecone decouplers. it has given me so many ideas over the past years of KSP.
